greeting: *laughs* So you're {empire_name}. I've heard of you. Your skull would make a fine trophy.
Warlord Kaine. I collect trophies from those I defeat. What will I take from you, {empire_name}?
Ah, {empire_name}. Fresh meat. I respect only strength. Show me what you've got.
battleTaunt: *laughs maniacally* HERE I COME, {empire_name}! Time to add your skull to my collection!
The carnage begins! I'll enjoy crushing your pathetic forces, {empire_name}! BLOOD AND GLORY!
Your fear is DELICIOUS! Run if you want—I enjoy the chase! *laughs*
victoryGloat: *examines trophy* Another skull for my wall! {empire_name} fell beautifully! WHO'S NEXT?!
GLORIOUS SLAUGHTER! Your empire bleeds so prettily! *laughs* I LOVE my job!
Dominance established! Your forces were weak, but the battle was entertaining! More! I want MORE!
defeat: *spits blood* You... you actually hurt me. *grins* I LIKE you, {empire_name}. Let's do this again!
A worthy opponent! You've earned my respect! But next time, YOUR skull will be mine!
Ha! You think this is victory? I ENJOYED that fight! Pain makes me STRONGER!
tradeOffer: I've got loot from my conquests. You want some? Trade me something interesting, {empire_name}.
Resources bore me. But my warriors need supplies. Give me what I want or I'll TAKE it.
Trade? *sighs* Fine. Business before pleasure. What do you have that's worth my time?
allianceProposal: You're strong, {empire_name}. Fight BESIDE me and we'll collect trophies together!
Join my warband! Together we'll crush everyone and bathe in the blood of our enemies!
Alliance? I prefer 'hunting partners.' What do you say? Ready to spill some blood?
betrayal: *laughs* Did you really trust a warlord? Your skull will be my FAVORITE trophy!
Alliances are for the weak! I only kept you around until you let your guard down! NOW DIE!
Nothing personal, {empire_name}. I just wanted a CHALLENGE! And you're it! *attacks*
covertDetected: Spies? COWARDS! Your little sneak is now my prisoner. I'll make them SCREAM before I'm done!
You sent spies instead of warriors? PATHETIC! Face me directly if you have any courage!
I caught your rat! *laughs* Thanks for the entertainment. Their skull will be small but memorable!
tributeDemand: Pay me 15,000 credits or I'll take EVERYTHING and your skull too! Your choice, weakling!
Tribute or combat. Either way, I get what I want. But tribute is BORING...
KNEEL and pay tribute! Or STAND and fight! Both options end the same way—my victory!
threatWarning: You're annoying me, {empire_name}. Keep it up and I'll make your destruction PERSONAL.
*sharpens blade* One more provocation. Just ONE. And I unleash everything I have.
I'm giving you this ONE warning because I respect your strength. Don't waste it.
retreat: Pulling back—FOR NOW! But I'll be back for your skull, {empire_name}! COUNT ON IT!
This isn't retreat, it's hunting strategy! When I return, you'll wish you'd finished me!
*laughs* Running away? No—I'm just making the hunt more interesting! See you soon!
eliminated: *coughs blood* What a fight... what a GLORIOUS fight... I die satisfied, {empire_name}...
My collection... my trophies... I leave them to the strongest. You earned them.
HAHAHAHA! Even in death... I regret NOTHING! Glory! CARNAGE! *dies laughing*
endgame: Turn {turn}! The FINAL HUNT! Who will take the ultimate trophy?! I CAN'T WAIT!
Endgame! All the weaklings are gone! Only the STRONG remain! THIS IS WHERE LEGENDS ARE MADE!
The galaxy's biggest fight is about to begin! My trophy room needs a GRAND FINALE!
broadcastShout: ATTENTION GALAXY! Warlord Kaine is BORED! Who dares challenge me?! I need more skulls!
I've conquered {turn} empires worth of territory! WHO WANTS TO BE NEXT?!
The carnage continues! My warband grows stronger! Join us or BECOME trophies!
casualMessage: Polishing my trophy collection today. Each skull tells a story. What will YOURS say?
My warriors are restless. They hunger for battle. Soon, we ride again.
I had a dream last night about the perfect battle. Maybe {empire_name} will provide it.
